title: my league isnt updating anything more than 0%
body: my league wont update the 6.18 patch it doesn't go anything past zero and after a while it says something about a error and its really annoying anyone know how to fix it or at least what the problem is

replies.body:
Hey there,

What error are you receiving?

Could you try [forcing a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4), let me know if this helps.
